wiki.content: The Iridescent Songfacts reports that this was the third Linkin Park contribution to the Transformers franchise. Said Mike Shinoda to MTV News: "The Transformers collaboration has been really fun for us. I mean, we grew up playing with the toys. When we first got approached on the first one, we said yes based on the idea of taking that thing that we loved so much and bringing it to life in a modern way. As it's gone on, that's still a big part of it for us." User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The Iridescent Songfacts reports that this was the third Linkin Park contribution to the Transformers franchise. Said Mike Shinoda to MTV News: "The Transformers collaboration has been really fun for us. I mean, we grew up playing with the toys. When we first got approached on the first one, we said yes based on the idea of taking that thing that we loved so much and bringing it to life in a modern way. As it's gone on, that's still a big part of it for us."

I liked this song and the album. Most of the songs have a ballad sound to them. I like them here. I think it is their best work and shows growth. I am surprised this album did not lift off the ground. I could hear this on the radio.
